title: fried Dover sole with a shrimp and caper butter sauce and wilted spinach
description: Surprise yourself and create this classic restaurant dish easily at home. Look for a nut-brown colour in the butter (beurre noisette) before squeezing in the lemon juice to lock in the colour and flavour.
ingredients: 2 whole Dover sole, filleted and pin boned
25g/1oz plain flour, seasoned with salt and pepper
1 lemon, peeled with spoon to remove all the pith and finely sliced to resemble flowers
